title: PHPmysqli_thread_safe()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPmysqli_thread_safe()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Definition and Usage
The mysqli_thread_safe() function returns whether the client library is compiled as thread-safe.
Syntax
mysqli_thread_safe()
Technical Details
Return Value:
TRUE if the client library is thread-safe. FALSE otherwise
PHP Version:
5+

★
+1

quiz.question: What is function returns whether the client library?
quiz.explanation: The correct definition of function returns whether the client library is 'compiled as thread-safe'.

quiz.question: What is TRUE if the client library?
quiz.explanation: The correct definition of TRUE if the client library is 'thread-safe'.
